snippet: Two men, ages 82 and 76, were the country’s latest victims of an illness that has forced over 1,160 schools and kindergartens to shut down temporarily.
abstract: South Korea confirms two more deaths in Middle East respiratory syndrome outbreak.
lead_paragraph: Two men, ages 82 and 76, were the country’s latest victims of an illness that has forced over 1,160 schools and kindergartens to shut down temporarily.

headline.main: South Korea Confirms 2 More Deaths in MERS Outbreak
headline.print_headline: South Korea Confirms 2 More Deaths in Outbreak
